name: .SPF File Extension
summary: Learn about .SPF files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use the Explore Backup Wizard included in StorageCraft ShadowProtect (Windows) to mount the backup disk image an SPF file contains. For more information, including instructions on how to use SPI incremental backups alongside an SPF file, refer to StorageCraft's official support documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
